title: KGW Portfolio Notes
text:
Preface
This is a Quarto book. My portfolio. If I can make it work.
To learn more about Quarto books visit https://quarto.org/docs/books.

1 + 1

[1] 2

title: 1Â  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.

section: 2.4 FIX - fix warning for using deprecated purrr in hexwall.R file
text:
2.4 FIX - fix warning for using deprecated purrr in hexwall.R file
Warning: invoke() was deprecated in purrr 1.0.0. â„¹ Please use exec() instead. This warning is displayed once every 8 hours. Call lifecycle::last_lifecycle_warnings() to see where this warning was generated.

title: 2Â  Hexwall
text:
2.5 load hexwall.R function

source("~/Documents/r-studio-and-git/KGW_Portfolio_Notes/hexwall.R")

Linking to ImageMagick 6.9.13.29
Enabled features: cairo, fontconfig, freetype, heic, lcms, pango, raw, rsvg, webp
Disabled features: fftw, ghostscript, x11

test <- hexwall("~/Documents/r-studio-and-git/KGW_Portfolio_Notes/my_stickers", sticker_row_size = 7, sticker_width = 200)

Warning: `invoke()` was deprecated in purrr 1.0.0.
â„¹ Please use `exec()` instead.

test

title: 2Â  Hexwall
section: 2.8 FIX - data.table is not working properly â€“ needs to be fixed
text:
2.8 FIX - data.table is not working properly â€“ needs to be fixed
It seems to be reading, but not displaying in data.table format correctly.
It works within R, but not in Quarto when rendered.
